mapper.sql: select id, name, parent_id, sequence, path, component, `query`, is_frame, is_cache, type, hidden, ifnull(perms, '') as perms, icon, create_time from sys_menu
mapper.select: select distinct m.id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.path, m.component, m.`query`, m.hidden, ifnull(m.perms, '') as perms, m.is_frame, m.is_cache, m.type, m.icon, m.sequence, m.create_time from gy_sys_menu m where m.type in ('M', 'C') order by m.parent_id, m.sequence

select distinct m.id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.path, m.component, m.`query`, m.hidden, ifnull(m.perms, '') as perms, m.is_frame, m.is_cache, m.type, m.icon, m.sequence, m.create_time from gy_sys_menu m left join gy_sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join gy_sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join gy_role ro on ur.role_id = ro.id left join gy_sys_user u on ur.user_id = u.id where u.id = #{userId} and m.type in ('M', 'C') order by m.parent_id, m.sequence
select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id

select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where m.status = '0' and r.status = '0' and ur.user_id = #{userId}
select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id where m.status = '0' and rm.role_id = #{roleId}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu( menu_id, parent_id, menu_name, order_num, path, component, `query`, is_frame, is_cache, menu_type, visible, status, perms, icon, remark, create_by, create_time )values( #{menuId}, #{parentId}, #{menuName}, #{orderNum}, #{path}, #{component}, #{query}, #{isFrame}, #{isCache}, #{menuType}, #{visible}, #{status}, #{perms}, #{icon}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )
